original:
With determination, passion
and pride!
That's how we Numemon learned
to survive, nume!
translation:
With determination, passion
and pride!
That's how we Numemon learned
to survive, nume!

original:
Yo, nume!
Nu nu nu nu?!
I really can't believe you beat the
Local Champion...
But since we got the message, 
I have no choice but to believe it...
Hrrrmph!
translation:
Yo, nume!
Nu nu nu nu?!
I really can't believe you beat the
Local Champion...
But since we got the message, 
I have no choice but to believe it...
Hrrrmph!

original:
Yo, nume!
What're you going on about?
Bronze Tamers aren't that
rare, you know!
The Tamers who took care of us...

Their ranks are even higher than
mere Bronze, nume!
Hyaaah!
translation:
Yo, nume!
What're you going on about?
Bronze Tamers aren't that
rare, you know!
The Tamers who took care of us...

Their ranks are even higher than
mere Bronze, nume!
Hyaaah!

original:
Yo, nume!
So you're Silver rank, now!
If you think that'd freak us out,
you're so wrong, nume!
Our Tamers have a much higher
rank than that!
You've got a long way to go!
translation:
Yo, nume!
So you're Silver rank, now!
If you think that'd freak us out,
you're so wrong, nume!
Our Tamers have a much higher
rank than that!
You've got a long way to go!

original:
Yo, nume!
You look as arrogant as always!
How cheeky of you to rank up
to Gold, nume!
Our Tamers have that rank, too!

Still, that's quite impressive.
Great job! Way to go!
translation:
Yo, nume!
You look as arrogant as always!
How cheeky of you to rank up
to Gold, nume!
Our Tamers have that rank, too!

Still, that's quite impressive.
Great job! Way to go!

original:
Yo, nume!
Why do you look so gloomy?
The Tamers and Digimon were
taken from the DigiColosseum?!
Then what are you doing messing
around out here?!
You're the number one Tamer in
the Digital World now, nume!
If you're not gonna fight now, then
when will you?!
Go now and wreck those
Selectors, nume!
translation:
Yo, nume!
Why do you look so gloomy?
The Tamers and Digimon were
taken from the DigiColosseum?!
Then what are you doing messing
around out here?!
You're the number one Tamer in
the Digital World now, nume!
If you're not gonna fight now, then
when will you?!
Go now and wreck those
Selectors, nume!

original:
Huh? You...
Are you a Tamer, nume?
Wow! It's been a while since we've
seen a Tamer around here!
translation:
Huh? You...
Are you a Tamer, nume?
Wow! It's been a while since we've
seen a Tamer around here!

original:
This place is Numemon City.
It's full of Numemon only, nume.
What could a Tamer like you want
here?
Did you come here to pick a fight
or something, nume?
translation:
This place is Numemon City.
It's full of Numemon only, nume.
What could a Tamer like you want
here?
Did you come here to pick a fight
or something, nume?

original:
Whoa! I can't believe it, nume!
You've earned my respect!
I mean, you managed to defeat
the Local Champion, nume??!
But keep this in mind...

A Numemon never forgets a 
grudge, nume.
translation:
Whoa! I can't believe it, nume!
You've earned my respect!
I mean, you managed to defeat
the Local Champion, nume??!
But keep this in mind...

A Numemon never forgets a 
grudge, nume.

original:
Uwah! You're a Bronze Tamer now,
nume?!
No wonder, after all, you're the one
who made enemies of the Numemon
and wrought havoc on Numemon
City, nume♪
translation:
Uwah! You're a Bronze Tamer now,
nume?!
No wonder, after all, you're the one
who made enemies of the Numemon
and wrought havoc on Numemon
City, nume♪

original:
Whether you're Silver or Gold, that
doesn't matter.
Those who defeat the Champion
are enemies of the Numemon.
Well, if you become the World
Champion...
Then we Numemon will accept you.
translation:
Whether you're Silver or Gold, that
doesn't matter.
Those who defeat the Champion
are enemies of the Numemon.
Well, if you become the World
Champion...
Then we Numemon will accept you.

original:
Whether you're Silver or Gold, that
doesn't matter.
Those who defeat the Champion
are enemies of the Numemon.
Well, if you become the World
Champion...
Then we Numemon will accept you.
translation:
Whether you're Silver or Gold, that
doesn't matter.
Those who defeat the Champion
are enemies of the Numemon.
Well, if you become the World
Champion...
Then we Numemon will accept you.

original:
Heeeh, you've become the World
Champion...?
I won't say more than 'awesome',
but I respect you, seriously, nume.
Do you plan to attack the Selectors
now?
Then allow me to call you brother
from now on, nume!
translation:
Heeeh, you've become the World
Champion...?
I won't say more than 'awesome',
but I respect you, seriously, nume.
Do you plan to attack the Selectors
now?
Then allow me to call you brother
from now on, nume!

original:
Nume Nume Numeme♪
Nume Numeme♪
translation:
Nume Nume Numeme♪
Nume Numeme♪

original: ...Whip!
translation: ...Whip!

original:
Whiiips...
Ow... my head hurts, nume...
Please don't try to talk to me 
about complex stuff right now...
translation:
Whiiips...
Ow... my head hurts, nume...
Please don't try to talk to me 
about complex stuff right now...

original:
...B-bronze?!
.........
So you made it to the
DigiColosseum, nume...
Then it's only natural we lost
to you...
translation:
...B-bronze?!
.........
So you made it to the
DigiColosseum, nume...
Then it's only natural we lost
to you...

original:
...Silver?!
You're a Silver Tamer now?!
What's with that incredibly fast
rise in rank?!
translation:
...Silver?!
You're a Silver Tamer now?!
What's with that incredibly fast
rise in rank?!

original:
...What?!
You're a Gold Tamer now, nume?!
Why the heck are you bragging 
about pointless stuff?!
I'll never acknowledge you, nume!
I'm not listening to you, nume!
translation:
...What?!
You're a Gold Tamer now, nume?!
Why the heck are you bragging 
about pointless stuff?!
I'll never acknowledge you, nume!
I'm not listening to you, nume!

original:
I know what happened at the
DigiColosseum...
But I didn't want to know...
I refuse to believe it!
translation:
I know what happened at the
DigiColosseum...
But I didn't want to know...
I refuse to believe it!

original:
We are Team Numemon and we 
will never give up!
But we're just taking a tiiiny break 
right now, nume!
translation:
We are Team Numemon and we 
will never give up!
But we're just taking a tiiiny break 
right now, nume!

original:
Please wait, nume!
Wait for me, nume!
translation:
Please wait, nume!
Wait for me, nume!

original:
The Champion has been defeated?!
Numemememe...
I see... 
So that's how it is, nume...
I guess the fight has come to an 
end for Team Numemon...
translation:
The Champion has been defeated?!
Numemememe...
I see... 
So that's how it is, nume...
I guess the fight has come to an 
end for Team Numemon...

original:
I know that you're a Bronze Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Are you actually that interested
in Numemon City, nume...?
translation:
I know that you're a Bronze Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Are you actually that interested
in Numemon City, nume...?

original:
I know that you're a Silver Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Do you actually want to live in
Numemon City, nume...?
translation:
I know that you're a Silver Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Do you actually want to live in
Numemon City, nume...?

original:
I know that you're a Gold Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Are you actually obsessed with
Numemon City, nume...?
translation:
I know that you're a Gold Tamer
now and all, nume...
But why go out of your way to 
come here and boast about it...?
Are you actually obsessed with
Numemon City, nume...?

original:
I know that you're a Platinum 
Tamer now and all, nume...
But just what are you doing here,
nume?
You've gotta stand and fight!
Face them without running, nume!
If you won't fight, then why did
you become so strong?!
translation:
I know that you're a Platinum 
Tamer now and all, nume...
But just what are you doing here,
nume?
You've gotta stand and fight!
Face them without running, nume!
If you won't fight, then why did
you become so strong?!

original:
Grrr! So you've made it this far, 
nume.
In that case, fighting is impossible
for Numemon #1, nume!
translation:
Grrr! So you've made it this far, 
nume.
In that case, fighting is impossible
for Numemon #1, nume!

original:
No matter what happens now...

Numemon #1 refuses to fight you
anymore, nume!
translation:
No matter what happens now...

Numemon #1 refuses to fight you
anymore, nume!

original:
The Local Champion lost?
Then could it be...
Because we, Team Numemon,
were completely useless...?
translation:
The Local Champion lost?
Then could it be...
Because we, Team Numemon,
were completely useless...?

original:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Bronze or Broccoli, nume.
Allow me to give you the title of
'Numemon Tamer', if you want.
translation:
You're a Bronze Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Bronze or Broccoli, nume.
Allow me to give you the title of
'Numemon Tamer', if you want.

original:
You're a Silver Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Silver or Silicon gel, nume.
Allow me to give you the title of
'Numemon Gel', if you want.
translation:
You're a Silver Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Silver or Silicon gel, nume.
Allow me to give you the title of
'Numemon Gel', if you want.

original:
You're a Gold Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Gold or Orichalcum, nume.
Additionally, the only thing that 
won't break is a Numemon's heart!
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer?
........
You can be whatever rank you like,
be it Gold or Orichalcum, nume.
Additionally, the only thing that 
won't break is a Numemon's heart!

original:
...I wanted to go, nume.

We all wanted to go with the
Bandits, nume...
We wanted to stand and fight with
them at the DigiColosseum!
Even if we were defeated or 
kidnapped,
It's alright so long as we're 
together, nume!
It's so unfair...
translation:
...I wanted to go, nume.

We all wanted to go with the
Bandits, nume...
We wanted to stand and fight with
them at the DigiColosseum!
Even if we were defeated or 
kidnapped,
It's alright so long as we're 
together, nume!
It's so unfair...

original:
It doesn't matter whether we win
or lose, nume!
We already decided we won't
run away again, nume!
Why, you ask?
That's simple.
There's nowhere left to run to,
nume!
translation:
It doesn't matter whether we win
or lose, nume!
We already decided we won't
run away again, nume!
Why, you ask?
That's simple.
There's nowhere left to run to,
nume!

original:
The Local Champion sure was 
strong, wasn't she, nume?
Of course, it was obvious, nume.

That person...
Is our pride and joy, nume!
translation:
The Local Champion sure was 
strong, wasn't she, nume?
Of course, it was obvious, nume.

That person...
Is our pride and joy, nume!

original:
Putting aside the Bronze thing,
you madei t to the DigiColosseum?
You have some talent, nume...

I feel beyond jealous...
It's kinda exhausting, nume...
translation:
Putting aside the Bronze thing,
you madei t to the DigiColosseum?
You have some talent, nume...

I feel beyond jealous...
It's kinda exhausting, nume...

original:
'I'm a Silver Tamer now'...
You say that so casually, nume...
Do you know how many Tamers
achieve that rank, nume...?
And do you know how irritating it is
to have you brag in our faces?
translation:
'I'm a Silver Tamer now'...
You say that so casually, nume...
Do you know how many Tamers
achieve that rank, nume...?
And do you know how irritating it is
to have you brag in our faces?

original:
...*Cough*!

I... I see... you're a Gold Tamer,
now, nume?
It's too frustrating...
I almost attacked you, nume...
translation:
...*Cough*!

I... I see... you're a Gold Tamer,
now, nume?
It's too frustrating...
I almost attacked you, nume...

original:
.........
.........
We knew something would happen
at the DigiColosseum, nume.
But us and the Bandits knew
from the very start.
That's why that person decided
to leave the Numemon here.
Because we're not strong
enough, nume.
translation:
.........
.........
We knew something would happen
at the DigiColosseum, nume.
But us and the Bandits knew
from the very start.
That's why that person decided
to leave the Numemon here.
Because we're not strong
enough, nume.

original:
The one you want to meet is the
Local Champion, right?
What I'm saying is, we'll let you
go... so go, nume!
translation:
The one you want to meet is the
Local Champion, right?
What I'm saying is, we'll let you
go... so go, nume!

original:
They told us to protect this place,
nume?
I see... So the Champion probably
had no intention of returning...
...I understand.
We'll take care of it, nume.
translation:
They told us to protect this place,
nume?
I see... So the Champion probably
had no intention of returning...
...I understand.
We'll take care of it, nume.

original:
Until Tres... I mean, the Champion
returns...
No matter what happens, we'll
protect this place until the end!
translation:
Until Tres... I mean, the Champion
returns...
No matter what happens, we'll
protect this place until the end!

original:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Bronze Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
What are you doing, coming here
to boast, nume?!
I'm gonna kick your butt for sure!
translation:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Bronze Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
What are you doing, coming here
to boast, nume?!
I'm gonna kick your butt for sure!

original:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Silver Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
I'll turn all your party members
into Numemon, nume!
translation:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Silver Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
I'll turn all your party members
into Numemon, nume!

original:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Gold Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
What's with that smug look?!
I'll wipe that smirk off your face!
translation:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Gold Tamer♪
Wait... who wants to celebrate
for you, numeee?!
What's with that smug look?!
I'll wipe that smirk off your face!

original:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Platinum Tamer♪
This time I'll celebrate with you 
sincerely, nume.
So you'll go and save the Numemon!

You must, as the Tamer greater
than anyone else, nume!
translation:
Congratulations on ranking up
to Platinum Tamer♪
This time I'll celebrate with you 
sincerely, nume.
So you'll go and save the Numemon!

You must, as the Tamer greater
than anyone else, nume!

original:
Hurry before I change my mind!
Get going, nume!
translation:
Hurry before I change my mind!
Get going, nume!

original:
No matter what people say when
they come here...
The only one who we'll always
follow and obey...
Is the Local Champion, nume.
translation:
No matter what people say when
they come here...
The only one who we'll always
follow and obey...
Is the Local Champion, nume.

original:
.........

So we are to defend this place,
nume?
Alright, we'll do whatever the 
Local Champion asks us to, nume.
translation:
.........

So we are to defend this place,
nume?
Alright, we'll do whatever the 
Local Champion asks us to, nume.

original:
A Bronze Tamer isn't rare at all.

Even over on Motherboard 
Continent there was at least 100!
.........
.........
Then one day, they all just 
disappeared, nume.
translation:
A Bronze Tamer isn't rare at all.

Even over on Motherboard 
Continent there was at least 100!
.........
.........
Then one day, they all just 
disappeared, nume.

original:
A Silver Tamer isn't rare at all.

There were about 100 of them in the
Digital World!
.........
.........
But where on earth did they go,
nume...?
translation:
A Silver Tamer isn't rare at all.

There were about 100 of them in the
Digital World!
.........
.........
But where on earth did they go,
nume...?

original:
A Gold Tamer isn't rare at all.

There were at least 3 of them that
we know about, nume!
.........
.........
But I don't feel like talking about
that right now...
translation:
A Gold Tamer isn't rare at all.

There were at least 3 of them that
we know about, nume!
.........
.........
But I don't feel like talking about
that right now...

original:
A Platinum Tamer isn't rare at all.

When the world is on the verge of
destruction...
It's said that a Tamer would 
appear and save us all...
.........
.........
You've become that Tamer 
spoken of in legends, nume!
So you gotta save us! Go and show 
the world what you're made of!
translation:
A Platinum Tamer isn't rare at all.

When the world is on the verge of
destruction...
It's said that a Tamer would 
appear and save us all...
.........
.........
You've become that Tamer 
spoken of in legends, nume!
So you gotta save us! Go and show 
the world what you're made of!

original:
Fine, since we lost we'll allow
you to pass, nume.
Now hurry and go!
translation:
Fine, since we lost we'll allow
you to pass, nume.
Now hurry and go!

original:
What?
The Local Champion disappeared?
I see, so she's really gone, nume...
translation:
What?
The Local Champion disappeared?
I see, so she's really gone, nume...

original:
Until the day we are able to meet
that person again...
We'll get stronger and stronger,
nume!
translation:
Until the day we are able to meet
that person again...
We'll get stronger and stronger,
nume!

original:
So you're a Bronze Tamer, now?
Then that means...
You won at least once at the
DigiColosseum, right, nume?
I guess no matter how hard we
work, the gap is just too wide...
translation:
So you're a Bronze Tamer, now?
Then that means...
You won at least once at the
DigiColosseum, right, nume?
I guess no matter how hard we
work, the gap is just too wide...

original:
So you're a Silver Tamer, now?
Guess that's how things are.
We, who lost our Tamers, can't
possibly hope to keep up, nume.
translation:
So you're a Silver Tamer, now?
Guess that's how things are.
We, who lost our Tamers, can't
possibly hope to keep up, nume.

original:
So you're a Gold Tamer, now?
I guess all I can do is laugh.
I mean, you're not longer at a
level we can compete with, nume.
For some reason, I feel both
relieved and disappointed, nume.
translation:
So you're a Gold Tamer, now?
I guess all I can do is laugh.
I mean, you're not longer at a
level we can compete with, nume.
For some reason, I feel both
relieved and disappointed, nume.

original:
So you're a Platinum Tamer, now?
I see, then...
You also defeated the Bandits in 
their released Digicore form?
........

Then, in place of the Bandits...
You've gotta go save the world!
You're the strongest Tamer in 
the Digital World, right, nume?
So you have to go and defeat
the Selectors, no matter what!
translation:
So you're a Platinum Tamer, now?
I see, then...
You also defeated the Bandits in 
their released Digicore form?
........

Then, in place of the Bandits...
You've gotta go save the world!
You're the strongest Tamer in 
the Digital World, right, nume?
So you have to go and defeat
the Selectors, no matter what!

original:
You're going to Graphics Board 
North...?
B...but... that place is...
.........
Fine, you can go wherever you want.

If you find a warm place, that's
Graphics Board North.
Asking me about other places is
pointless.
It's so... so cold...
I can't even think anymore...
translation:
You're going to Graphics Board 
North...?
B...but... that place is...
.........
Fine, you can go wherever you want.

If you find a warm place, that's
Graphics Board North.
Asking me about other places is
pointless.
It's so... so cold...
I can't even think anymore...

original:
I think we'd become happy if the
Selectors were gone...
Then the Union will stop having 
that tournament.
And I won't have to check
everyone who comes here...
I can go back to someplace warm,
and live dripping with sweat.
I'll spend the year wearing
short sleeves and shorts!♪
translation:
I think we'd become happy if the
Selectors were gone...
Then the Union will stop having 
that tournament.
And I won't have to check
everyone who comes here...
I can go back to someplace warm,
and live dripping with sweat.
I'll spend the year wearing
short sleeves and shorts!♪

original:
Silver Tamer?
Doesn't matter one bit to me.
Some day you guys'll defeat the
Selectors.
So long as they exist, I can't
move from this spot...
It's been so cold I can't help
but feel sleepy...
But then my snot freezes and 
I can't breathe, so I wake up.
translation:
Silver Tamer?
Doesn't matter one bit to me.
Some day you guys'll defeat the
Selectors.
So long as they exist, I can't
move from this spot...
It's been so cold I can't help
but feel sleepy...
But then my snot freezes and 
I can't breathe, so I wake up.

original:
You're a Gold Tamer?
Not much longer now, then.
I'm sure you can challenge the
Selectors now that you're Gold...
What I'm saying is... go get them!

And hurry, please release me from
this place...
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer?
Not much longer now, then.
I'm sure you can challenge the
Selectors now that you're Gold...
What I'm saying is... go get them!

And hurry, please release me from
this place...

original:
You're the World Champion?!

Then everyone's gonna go fight
the Selectors now, right?!
...No?

I'm begging you, please, I'm so
cold... I'm at my limit...
translation:
You're the World Champion?!

Then everyone's gonna go fight
the Selectors now, right?!
...No?

I'm begging you, please, I'm so
cold... I'm at my limit...

original:
The Tamers that disappeared from
Motherboard Continent...?
A number of them should be here
on Graphics Board Continent!
But... probably not ALL of them...

Because there aren't that many
Tamers living in the Cities...
translation:
The Tamers that disappeared from
Motherboard Continent...?
A number of them should be here
on Graphics Board Continent!
But... probably not ALL of them...

Because there aren't that many
Tamers living in the Cities...

original:
So you dragged the Local Champion
out...?
I'm more surprised about that than
about your victory over him.
That was no easy feat.
translation:
So you dragged the Local Champion
out...?
I'm more surprised about that than
about your victory over him.
That was no easy feat.

original:
It's obvious you'd at least become
a Bronze Tamer.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.
translation:
It's obvious you'd at least become
a Bronze Tamer.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.

original:
It was only obvious you'd reach
Silver Rank.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.
translation:
It was only obvious you'd reach
Silver Rank.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.

original:
It was only obvious you'd reach
Gold Rank.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.
My only role here is to give you
my congratulations.
translation:
It was only obvious you'd reach
Gold Rank.
I'm not surprised at all.
I can only give my congratulations.
My only role here is to give you
my congratulations.

original:
I'm not surprised about you
becoming a Platinum Tamer...
And about the Selectors attacking
the DigiColosseum...
But something within my heart
stirs...
Still, I feel pathetic for not going
to fight, despite that...
translation:
I'm not surprised about you
becoming a Platinum Tamer...
And about the Selectors attacking
the DigiColosseum...
But something within my heart
stirs...
Still, I feel pathetic for not going
to fight, despite that...

original:
Tamers do often come here,
one after the other...
But maybe it's because they
can't fight the Local Champion...
That they often wander off before
we even realize it...
Where did they go?
I'm afraid I have no idea,
translation:
Tamers do often come here,
one after the other...
But maybe it's because they
can't fight the Local Champion...
That they often wander off before
we even realize it...

I'm surprised you made it this far!

Both Tamers and Digimon...?
...I get it, but then...

Get yourself together,

Then what's with that gloomy look?

Get yourself together,
Platinum Tamer!

After all, you can't go and fight
the Local Champion...

Make yourself at home.

right?
Is it true that the Colosseum was

...So it was true...

Hmmm hmmm hmmm♪

Hmmm hmmm hmmm♪
.........
What? Was I humming just now?!

opened up, you say?
Don't go saying that now...

gone...

Ahaha...

Ahahaha... Of course you have...

Ahaha...
You're a Bronze Tamer...?

Ohhh, you're a Silver Tamer now?

Ohhh, you're a Silver Tamer now?

Ahaha... It's just too much.

Whaaat? Since when did you

AhahahaaaACHOO!

original:
Welcome back.

BanchoLeomon busted open the
door just before.
But it didn't seem like a heartfelt
reunion.
I heard some awful bickering going
on in there...
translation:
Welcome back.

BanchoLeomon busted open the
door just before.
But it didn't seem like a heartfelt
reunion.
I heard some awful bickering going
on in there...

original:
Take care of yourself if you want to
stop the conflict, okay?
translation:
Take care of yourself if you want to
stop the conflict, okay?

original:
I heard some terrible sounds 
coming from inside...
I wonder if everyone's okay
in there...?
translation:
I heard some terrible sounds 
coming from inside...
I wonder if everyone's okay
in there...?

original:
It's too quiet all of a sudden...
So I did some snooping around.
^P, you're really 
incredible, you know?
Being able to get those two back
together again, and all.♪
translation:
It's too quiet all of a sudden...
So I did some snooping around.
^P, you're really 
incredible, you know?
Being able to get those two back
together again, and all.♪

original:
You made it to Bronze Tamer?
Already? That fast??
I'm pretty sure you were just a
novice not long ago...
translation:
You made it to Bronze Tamer?
Already? That fast??
I'm pretty sure you were just a
novice not long ago...

original:
You're already a Silver Tamer now?

I knew you could, ^P!
That's no easy feat!
translation:
You're already a Silver Tamer now?

I knew you could, ^P!
That's no easy feat!

original:
I can't belive you're already a
Gold Tamer!
As expected, ^P♪
...Or maybe you exceed that!
translation:
I can't belive you're already a
Gold Tamer!
As expected, ^P♪
...Or maybe you exceed that!

original:
You're gonna fight the Selectors?
I'm sure you can handle it.
But I don't get it...
Why just you, ^P?
The Colosseum was attacked?!
Everyone was kidnapped?!
.........

That's terrible, but all I can do is
wish you luck...
translation:
You're gonna fight the Selectors?
I'm sure you can handle it.
But I don't get it...
Why just you, ^P?
The Colosseum was attacked?!
Everyone was kidnapped?!
.........

That's terrible, but all I can do is
wish you luck...

original:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Is there anything you need?
translation:
Welcome to the Item Shop!
Is there anything you need?

original:
This is the Farm Shop.
Do you need anything?
translation:
This is the Farm Shop.
Do you need anything?

original:
Could you please restrain yourself
and not enter this island?
We're about to hold a secret
ritual soon.
There's no way we can allow 
others to see it.
To be frank...

If anyone sees it, we cannot allow
them to leave alive.
translation:
Could you please restrain yourself
and not enter this island?
We're about to hold a secret
ritual soon.
There's no way we can allow 
others to see it.
To be frank...

If anyone sees it, we cannot allow
them to leave alive.

original:
I'll tell you about North City's
curse.
No one can leave here without
losing something important.
If someone manages to...
I couldn't forgive them!
translation:
I'll tell you about North City's
curse.
No one can leave here without
losing something important.
If someone manages to...
I couldn't forgive them!

original:
Are you the Tamer who defeated
the Local Champion?
Here's a prediction for you.

You'll lose something bigger than
anyone else.
If you don't, I won't forgive you!
translation:
Are you the Tamer who defeated
the Local Champion?
Here's a prediction for you.

You'll lose something bigger than
anyone else.
If you don't, I won't forgive you!

original:
Are you the one who became
a Bronze Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!
translation:
Are you the one who became
a Bronze Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!

original:
Are you the one who became
a Silver Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!
translation:
Are you the one who became
a Silver Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!

original:
Are you the one who became
a Gold Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!
translation:
Are you the one who became
a Gold Tamer?
Here's a prediction for you.
Your luck ends here!
If it doesn't, I won't forgive you!

original:
Are you the one who won the
Championship...?
Hmph, if you can win that with luck,
you should be fine.
You're strong, right?!
Don't lose to those Selectors!
Go and give them a hard punch
right to the face!
translation:
Are you the one who won the
Championship...?
Hmph, if you can win that with luck,
you should be fine.
You're strong, right?!
Don't lose to those Selectors!
Go and give them a hard punch
right to the face!

original:
Hm? A newbie, eh?

So long as I'm here, I won't allow
you to continue forward!
.........
Just joking!
When I first arrived in this city,

I was told the same thing by an
older Tamer.
I didn't understand it at the time,
but I do now.
That neither of us could ever
hope to have continued forward.
translation:
Hm? A newbie, eh?

So long as I'm here, I won't allow
you to continue forward!
.........
Just joking!
When I first arrived in this city,

I was told the same thing by an
older Tamer.
I didn't understand it at the time,
but I do now.
That neither of us could ever
hope to have continued forward.

original:
Oh, so you defeated the Local
Champion?
That means you must have 
defeated Idearu, too?
Ahhh...

Not letting anyone pass is what
that guy prides himself on.
translation:
Oh, so you defeated the Local
Champion?
That means you must have 
defeated Idearu, too?
Ahhh...

Not letting anyone pass is what
that guy prides himself on.

original:
It must have been rough reaching
Bronze Rank, huh?
At first, I was fine no matter what
challenges I faced, but...
Recently I've been more and more
troubled...
This must be how it feels to fail
as a Tamer, huh...?
translation:
It must have been rough reaching
Bronze Rank, huh?
At first, I was fine no matter what
challenges I faced, but...
Recently I've been more and more
troubled...
This must be how it feels to fail
as a Tamer, huh...?

original:
The fact you've reached Silver Rank
means you've won twice, right...?
What's more, you won against the
tough Tamers at the Colosseum...
I was thinking about trying to 
attack from behind, but...
I'll stop that for today.
translation:
The fact you've reached Silver Rank
means you've won twice, right...?
What's more, you won against the
tough Tamers at the Colosseum...
I was thinking about trying to 
attack from behind, but...
I'll stop that for today.

original:
You're a Gold Tamer now...?
So you won four times??
What? Your opponent in the Gold
Tamer match was Arville?!
.........

Ah, my heart skipped a beat there.

A long time ago, she was weaker
than me...
I even used to call her a
greenhorn...
translation:
You're a Gold Tamer now...?
So you won four times??
What? Your opponent in the Gold
Tamer match was Arville?!
.........

Ah, my heart skipped a beat there.

A long time ago, she was weaker
than me...
I even used to call her a
greenhorn...

original:
I heard the DigiColosseum was
attacked by the Selectors.
They kidnapped everyone who
participated in the Championship...
I'd like to say 'serves them right!'
and feel at ease, but...
One of those Tamers over there
is a friend of mine...
I don't know anything about what
happened over there, but...
That person is a precious friend
of mine!
I'll do anything! So please go and
rescue them!
translation:
I heard the DigiColosseum was
attacked by the Selectors.
They kidnapped everyone who
participated in the Championship...
I'd like to say 'serves them right!'
and feel at ease, but...
One of those Tamers over there
is a friend of mine...
I don't know anything about what
happened over there, but...
That person is a precious friend
of mine!
I'll do anything! So please go and
rescue them!

original:
Damn...
I'm so close...
But I just can't close that gap...

See that Guard Tamer standing
before the Champion?
He looks so weak, and yet I can't
manage to beat him!
Just what is my issue...

What? 'That's just life'?
Why don't you just shut up!
translation:
Damn...
I'm so close...
But I just can't close that gap...

See that Guard Tamer standing
before the Champion?
He looks so weak, and yet I can't
manage to beat him!
Just what is my issue...

What? 'That's just life'?
Why don't you just shut up!

original:
What?!
You defeated the Champion?!
Damn it! Shut up!
Stop talking to me!
People talking about their 
successes hits me hard!
translation:
What?!
You defeated the Champion?!
Damn it! Shut up!
Stop talking to me!
People talking about their 
successes hits me hard!

original:
Shut up! Don't go telling me you
ranked up or something!
People talking about their
successes makes my blood boil!
If you say any more, 
My hearts gonna give out!
translation:
Shut up! Don't go telling me you
ranked up or something!
People talking about their
successes makes my blood boil!
If you say any more, 
My hearts gonna give out!

original:
Go away! Don't tell me you became 
a Silver Tamer!
People talking about their 
successes shatters my pride!
Others' successes are my 
downfall!
translation:
Go away! Don't tell me you became 
a Silver Tamer!
People talking about their 
successes shatters my pride!
Others' successes are my 
downfall!

original:
Stop it! Don't tell me you've 
become a Gold Tamer!
If I hear one more thing about
you...
.........
...Don't you get it, yet??
My heart's already shattered,
my pride turned to dust...
So please don't talk about
Tamer Ranks anymore...
If you do, I'll start rolling on the
ground kicking and screaming!
translation:
Stop it! Don't tell me you've 
become a Gold Tamer!
If I hear one more thing about
you...
.........
...Don't you get it, yet??
My heart's already shattered,
my pride turned to dust...
So please don't talk about
Tamer Ranks anymore...
If you do, I'll start rolling on the
ground kicking and screaming!

original:
.........
Is that so? That's good.
So there are no more Elite 
Tamers...
I don't have to hear any 
success stories anymore...
...You're still here, though.
translation:
.........
Is that so? That's good.
So there are no more Elite 
Tamers...
I don't have to hear any 
success stories anymore...
...You're still here, though.

original:
Don't talk to me anymore unless 
you want your throat ripped out.
translation:
Don't talk to me anymore unless 
you want your throat ripped out.

original:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!
translation:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!

original:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!
translation:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!

original:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!
translation:
Like I care!

Who you won against!
What rank you are!
I just don't care!

original:
The new Tamer Union got crushed
by the Selectors, too?
.........
Hahahaha...
Mwahahahahaha!
Serves them right!
translation:
The new Tamer Union got crushed
by the Selectors, too?
.........
Hahahaha...
Mwahahahahaha!
Serves them right!

original:
This is North City,
The city of hell!
All people do here is writhe in
pain and agony!
...Hm? It's just me?
No way...
translation:
This is North City,
The city of hell!
All people do here is writhe in
pain and agony!
...Hm? It's just me?
No way...

original:
I-It's not my fault that I never
get rewarded!
Surely it's someone elses fault!
It's gotta be someone somewhere!
Hm? When I mean somewhere, 
I mean where!
When I mean someone,
I mean who is it?!
Who is it?!
Where are you?!
translation:
I-It's not my fault that I never
get rewarded!
Surely it's someone elses fault!
It's gotta be someone somewhere!
Hm? When I mean somewhere, 
I mean where!
When I mean someone,
I mean who is it?!
Who is it?!
Where are you?!

original:
B... ron... ze?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...
translation:
B... ron... ze?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...

original:
S... il... ver?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...
translation:
S... il... ver?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...

original:
G... ol... d?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...
translation:
G... ol... d?
Sorry, I don't understand...
.........
Actually, I don't want to.
Seeing other people happy makes
me feel like crying...

original:
When someone tells you their
happy story...
It feels like you're chewing on
aluminium foil, doesn't it?
That's why when I heard what
happened over at the Colosseum...
I thought I would feel a little
happier...
...Hey, ^P...
You're gonna save them, right?
Good luck, then.
I'll be cheering for you!
translation:
When someone tells you their
happy story...
It feels like you're chewing on
aluminium foil, doesn't it?
That's why when I heard what
happened over at the Colosseum...
I thought I would feel a little
happier...
...Hey, ^P...
You're gonna save them, right?
Good luck, then.
I'll be cheering for you!

original:
Strong! Fast! Beautiful!
Yeaaah! Gaogamon!
.........

Hah, I just felt like saying that.
There's no reason in particular.
translation:
Strong! Fast! Beautiful!
Yeaaah! Gaogamon!
.........

Hah, I just felt like saying that.
There's no reason in particular.

original:
You beat the Local Champion?
You better head to the Colosseum.
I also once planned on fighting on 
the Tamer Unions home turf...
Thrashing and bashing around...
But before that could happen...
My Tamer faced a setback,
and was utterly crushed...
translation:
You beat the Local Champion?
You better head to the Colosseum.
I also once planned on fighting on 
the Tamer Unions home turf...
Thrashing and bashing around...
But before that could happen...
My Tamer faced a setback,
and was utterly crushed...

original:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!
translation:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!

original:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!
translation:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!

original:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!
translation:
I wondered where he went...
But he's in the Championship, huh?
I'm glad, that's reassuring...
Wait, no! That's terrible!
So scary...
.........
Uwaaaaaaaaaah!

original:
The Colosseum was attacked and
the Union destroyed?!
W...What?!
I won't forgive this!
I had always dreamed of 
participating at the Colosseum!
Please, you've gotta help!
Don't let my dream die!
translation:
The Colosseum was attacked and
the Union destroyed?!
W...What?!
I won't forgive this!
I had always dreamed of 
participating at the Colosseum!
Please, you've gotta help!
Don't let my dream die!

original:
Did you enter this city with that
foolishly smiling face and think...
"Oh, this place seems nice, I can
lower my guard here!"...?
Guys like you just end up scurrying
home, eyes full of tears!
translation:
Did you enter this city with that
foolishly smiling face and think...
"Oh, this place seems nice, I can
lower my guard here!"...?
Guys like you just end up scurrying
home, eyes full of tears!

original:
The Local Champion lost...?
I can't believe it...
And by the brat with that cheeky
smile, too?!
I may have underestimated you...
translation:
The Local Champion lost...?
I can't believe it...
And by the brat with that cheeky
smile, too?!
I may have underestimated you...

original:
Bronze, huh?

Well, you defeated the Champion,
so it shouldn't have been difficult.
translation:
Bronze, huh?

Well, you defeated the Champion,
so it shouldn't have been difficult.

original:
Silver, huh?

Well, you defeated the Champion,
so it shouldn't have been difficult.
translation:
Silver, huh?

Well, you defeated the Champion,
so it shouldn't have been difficult.

original:
Gold Tamer?!
........
That's pretty incredible...

I'm honestly not sure what to think
right now...
translation:
Gold Tamer?!
........
That's pretty incredible...

I'm honestly not sure what to think
right now...

original:
I heard a rumor that you were 
going to fight the Selectors?
You're gonna save all those
kidnapped by them, too?
Why are you being so foolish?
It all seems so crazy...
...But you're determined, and we
know you have crazy skills.
While I'm totally uncool,
your coolness is off the charts!
Go, ^P!
Defeat those Selectors!
translation:
I heard a rumor that you were 
going to fight the Selectors?
You're gonna save all those
kidnapped by them, too?
Why are you being so foolish?
It all seems so crazy...
...But you're determined, and we
know you have crazy skills.
While I'm totally uncool,
your coolness is off the charts!
Go, ^P!
Defeat those Selectors!

original:
Hmph, another incompetent
Tamer has gotten lost, huh?
There's no way you can win
and continue forward...
So just hurry and leave! 
You can't stay in this city!
translation:
Hmph, another incompetent
Tamer has gotten lost, huh?
There's no way you can win
and continue forward...
So just hurry and leave! 
You can't stay in this city!

original:
What?
You defeated the Local Champion?
Then the next Champion is a
nonchalant character like you??
No? I guess not, huh...

It's WaruSeadramon?!
Isn't that somehow worse?!
translation:
What?
You defeated the Local Champion?
Then the next Champion is a
nonchalant character like you??
No? I guess not, huh...

It's WaruSeadramon?!
Isn't that somehow worse?!
